message: so is this group an experiment in auto-creating topics based on an rss feed?
Can't wait for the open source release of this, looks like really cool technology they've built.
We could probably make some use of it for Convore.
@djchall Nope, I'm just seeding it with some conversation starters, but someone's welcome to create a bot that does that :)
@ericflo is there documentation about how to write bots for @convore?
Seriously though, Rainbird looks like some really neat tech...and it's built on top of the distributed counters patch for Cassandra, which was a lot of complex work.
